text:
Dear Clinic Management

I am writing to express my concern regarding the service quality at Sungei Tangah Lodge. During my visit, I observed that the staff did not communicate respectfully or behave professionally, particularly towards migrant workers. This is disappointing, as every patient deserves equal care and respect regardless of their background.

Additionally, while the clinic‚Äôs d√©cor is well-maintained, the overall service experience does not meet the expected standards. A healthcare facility should prioritize patient care and ensure that staff members are courteous and professional.

I sincerely request the management to take necessary steps to improve service quality by training staff to be more respectful and attentive. A positive and welcoming environment will benefit both patients and the clinic‚Äôs reputation.

Thank you for considering this feedback. I hope to see improvements in the future.

It is mandatory to wear a mask to enter for a doctor's consultation here. However, the hospital does not provide masks. Refer to buy from a nearby store for one mask. I buy a new box, use one mask only  and give it to them. That mask is not give  to anyone else. Then, everybody referred to buy more, with a price of about 2 dollars..
Come this clinic more happy and I go other clinic not happy. This clinic staff is very good üëç
